sentences.en: A law should be a reflex of the will of the people.
sentences.cn: 法律应该是人民意志的反映.

sentences.en: Adequate doses of atropine can abolish many types of reflex vagal cardiac slowing or asystole.
sentences.cn: 适当剂量的阿托品能消除多种类型的迷走反射性心效减慢或停搏.

sentences.en: Almost as a reflex action, I grab my pen as the phone rings.
sentences.cn: 就像是本能反应, 电话铃一响我就攥住钢笔.

sentences.en: Almost by reflex, he helped himself to a drink.
sentences.cn: 几乎是下意识的, 他给自己弄了杯酒.

sentences.en: Doctor Mulholland tested Jennifer’s reflexes (= especially by hitting her knee with a special rubber hammer ) .
sentences.cn: 马尔霍兰医生检查了珍妮弗的反射反应。

sentences.en: For a portly man like him, Uncle Tom still has quick reflex.
sentences.cn: 对于象他这样发福的人来说, 汤姆叔叔还算反应敏捷.

sentences.en: Her hand hit my nose and eyes, and tears came in my eyes from the reflex.
sentences.cn: 她的手打在我鼻子和眼睛上, 反应之下我的泪水立刻涌上眼来.

sentences.en: HRV and cardiovascular reflex tests ( CVR ) were performed in all people.
sentences.cn: 所有受检者均接受心血管反射试验 ( CVR ) 检查和HRV分析,并且绘制NN间期散点图.

sentences.en: I had the conviction Larkin's nerve would crack and he'd squeeze the trigger in a reflex action.
sentences.cn: 我确信拉金会神经崩溃，他会反射性地扣动扳机。

sentences.en: I have get a twin - lens reflex camera.
sentences.cn: 我有一架双镜头反射式照相机.

sentences.en: It is very useful to use a miniature reflex camera.
sentences.cn: 使用小型反光镜照相机很有用.

sentences.en: Likes with the love, also is the reflex action.
sentences.cn: 喜欢和爱, 也是反射作用.

sentences.en: Tests for blindness include a test for the eye preservation reflex and an obstacle test.
sentences.cn: 盲视试验包括眼的保护性反射和障碍试验.

sentences.en: The rapid movement of an object towards the eye triggers the blink reflex.
sentences.cn: 快速朝眼前移动物体,就会引起眨眼反应.

sentences.en: This feign death reflex is frozen afterwards by dissolution of memory.
sentences.cn: 这个假死的违反是冷酷的,通过随后的分散记忆.

sentences.en: Topological indices can reflex chemical and physical properties of molecules statistically.
sentences.cn: 分子的化学与物理性能一般能用分子图的拓扑指标统计地反映出来.

sentences.en: Walt fumbled in his pocket, a reflex from his smoking days.
sentences.cn: 沃尔特在口袋里摸索，一个他以前抽烟时形成的习惯性动作。
